## âœ… Checklist

## ğŸ” Types of Changes

- [ ] ğŸ› **Bug Fix**: A non-breaking change that fixes an issue.
- [ ] âœ¨ **New Feature**: A non-breaking change that adds functionality.
- [ ] ğŸ’¥ **Breaking Change**: A fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change.
- [ ] ğŸ“ **Documentation Update**: Changes to documentation only.
- [ ] ğŸ›  **Refactoring**: Code changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature.
